entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
